data.title: Sahar Dolatshahi
data.text: Sahar Dolatshahi (Persian: Ø³Ø­Ø± Ø¯ÙÙØªØ´Ø§ÙÛâ; born 8 October 1979) is an Iranian film, television and stage actress. She is a graduate of the Department of Dramatic and Translational Literature in French. In the film "Gold and Copper" directed by Homayoun Asadiyan in 2011, she was nominated for the Best Female Actor Award from the 14th Cinema House Celebration. In the thirty-third festival of Fajr Film Festival, Sahar Dolatshahi won the Best Actress in the film "Ice Age".
